tool_description: Creates a comprehensive plan for restructuring existing projects to follow best practices, including file movement, directory reorganization, and dependency updates.

target_structure.description: Target structure type: standard, microservices, monorepo, layered, mvc, clean_architecture

preserve_history.description: Attempt to preserve version control history during restructuring

migration_strategy.description: How to handle file conflicts: overwrite, skip, merge, rename

update_imports.description: Automatically update import statements after restructuring

error_messages: Current structure path not found: The specified path does not exist or is not accessible

Invalid migration strategy: Use one of [overwrite, skip, merge, rename]

usage: Specify current_structure_path, target_structure, and project_type. Configure options like preserve_history, backup_original, and migration_strategy. Use dry_run=true to preview changes first.

affected_files.description: Number of files that will be affected

file_movements.description: Files to be moved and their destinations
